statements: SELECT * FROM content_assets
SELECT id, title, tags FROM content_assets
SELECT title, description FROM content_assets WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE tags LIKE '%technology%'
SELECT description, title, id FROM content_assets ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM content_assets WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE tags LIKE '%tech%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, title FROM content_assets WHERE tags = 'programming' OR tags = 'coding' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, title, description FROM content_assets ORDER BY id ASC, title DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_assets;
SELECT title, tags FROM content_assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description FROM content_assets WHERE title = 'Example';
SELECT id, title, description, tags FROM content_assets WHERE tags LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT id, title, description FROM content_assets ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM content_assets WHERE tags LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM asset_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM content_assets WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND tags LIKE '%fun%';
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND tags IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, title, description FROM content_assets WHERE title LIKE '%video%' OR tags LIKE '%movie%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata;
SELECT id, title FROM asset_metadata WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT description FROM asset_metadata WHERE tags @> ARRAY['nature'];
SELECT * FROM asset_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM asset_categories WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata;
SELECT id, title, tags FROM asset_metadata WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, title, description, tags FROM asset_metadata WHERE tags @> ARRAY['nature'];
SELECT asset_metadata.id, asset_metadata.title, asset_tags.tag_name FROM asset_metadata JOIN asset_tags ON asset_metadata.tags[1] = asset_tags.tag_name;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(asset_metadata.id) FROM asset_categories JOIN asset_metadata ON asset_metadata.tags @> ARRAY[asset_categories.category_name] GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY COUNT(asset_metadata.id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets;
SELECT id, title FROM Titles WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM Descriptions WHERE content_id = 3;
SELECT title, tags FROM ContentAssets WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Tags ORDER BY tag DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM ContentAssets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, description, tags FROM ContentAssets WHERE id > 5;

SELECT Titles.title, Descriptions.content_id, ContentAssets.title FROM Titles INNER JOIN Descriptions ON Titles.content_id = Descriptions.content_id INNER JOIN ContentAssets ON Descriptions.content_id = ContentAssets.id;
SELECT id, title FROM ContentAssets WHERE tags LIKE '%tech%';
SELECT ContentAssets.title, Tags.tag FROM ContentAssets INNER JOIN Tags ON ContentAssets.id = Tags.content_id WHERE Tags.tag = 'programming';
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets;
SELECT title, description FROM ContentAssets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, tags FROM ContentAssets WHERE id > 5;
SELECT ca.content_id, ca.user_id, u.username FROM ContentAuthors ca JOIN Users u ON ca.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT ca.content_id, ca.tag_id, t.tag_name FROM ContentTags ca JOIN Tags t ON ca.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT id, title, description, tags FROM ContentAssets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT tag_name, tag_id FROM Tags ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT c.title, u.username, t.tag_name FROM ContentAssets c JOIN Users u ON c.id = u.user_id JOIN ContentTags ct ON c.id = ct.content_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM ContentAuthors ca JOIN Users u ON ca.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
